amendatorysection.para: Sections 83-1201 to 83-1227 shall be known and may be cited as the Developmental Disabilities Services Act.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB895, section 1, with LB1039, section 3, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB895 became effective April 8, 2016. Changes made by LB1039 became effective July 21, 2016.
